scripts.watch: yarn schema:copy && yarn schema:generate && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json -w
scripts.compile:sdks: yarn schema:copy && yarn schema:generate && tsc -b tsconfig.build.json
scripts.compile:dev: npm run compile:sdks && npm run compile:dev:secure-frame-front-end
scripts.compile:release: npm run compile:sdks && npm run compile:release:secure-frame-front-end
